attributes.action: Stand by the result of the U.K. referendum.
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron should start proceedings for the U.K. to leave the E.U. now  to avoid any interference from petitioners who think they know better than the people who voted to leave the E.U.
attributes.background: Young people have raised a petition calling for a reversal of the democratically achieved result of the E.U. in or out referendum i call on the Prime Minister to stand by the existing result to leave.
